name: Lake Hopping, Fishing & Cycling in the City of Seven Lakes
description: In this trip, you'll explore the breathtaking sites of San Pablo City, the City of Seven Lakes.  It is a three-hour bus ride from Metro Manila. This trip will offer not only the scenic, mesmerizing views but also different activities like cycling, swimming, fishing, rafting, eating local food, and feeding the animals. If you get lucky and it's harvest season, you may even get the chance to pick fruits yourselves.
